title: 16  Sergi Petrovich Burylin, Fragment (Depicting Tractors), 1930/31

<section class="osci-tk-epub-section tombstone" id="tombstone">16  
Designed by Sergi Petrovich Burylin (Russian, 1876–1942)  
Manufacturer unknown (Russia)  
Fragment (Depicting Tractors)   
1930/31  
Cotton, plain weave; block-, roller-, or screen-printed; 6.4 × 7.7 cm (2 1/2 × 3 in.)  
Harriott A. Fox and Mrs. Siegfried G. Schmidt endowments, 1993.52
